keyword: calories in chick fil a mac and cheese
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Mac and Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in Chick-fil-A mac and cheese per serving, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and quick variations for your meal planning.
h1: Calories in Chick-fil-A Mac and Cheese
assumptions: Standard small side serving (~170 g), prepared with elbow macaroni, cheese sauce, and cheddar; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, and customizations; values based on Chick-fil-A's standard small serving. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One small serving of Chick-fil-A mac and cheese provides 450 kcal and 17 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A mac and cheese small?
What's the protein in Chick-fil-A mac and cheese?
faqs.a: About 17 g protein per small serving.

faqs.q: Is Chick-fil-A mac and cheese high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 980 mg sodium per small serving.

faqs.q: How many carbs in Chick-fil-A mac and cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 35 g carbs, including 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does Chick-fil-A mac and cheese have trans fat?
faqs.a: It contains 0.5 g trans fat per small serving from the cheese sauce.
